page.title: 09DOWTY BOULTON PAUL cont'd
page.content: During the war, Dowty made aircraft for the airforce and gun turrets for the aircraft.The lowest paid apprentice in his/her first year earns forty seven pounds per week,but are expecting a rise to just over fifty pounds. The Managing Director earns two hundred and ninety pounds per week.He is the highest paid at Dowty's. Dowty's are part of a group,which started in Norwich and has its Headquarters in Cheltenham. There are branches of the factory all over the world,and although there are no plans to expand at the moment, they might widen their range of products.There are 37 companies in the group.Bilbrook is here because of Dowty's.The factory is sited there because of the canal and because of a contract with Wolverhampton Council.
